00052 class OSIMCOMMON_API Transform /* : public Object*/
00053 {
00054 public:
00055     enum AxisName {
00056         X=0, Y=1, Z=2, W=3, NoAxis=-1
00057     };
00058     // Translation is not accounted for here in RotationOrder
00059     // In all cases I've seen so far it's done either first or last
00060     // the caller routine is reponsible for making up this part of ordering
00061     // by calling functions in proper order.
00062     enum RotationOrder {    
00063         XYZ=0, XZY=1, YXZ=2, YZX=3, ZXY=4, ZYX=5
00064     };
00065     enum AnglePreference {
00066         Radians, Degrees
00067     };
00068 
00069 //=============================================================================
00070 // DATA
00071 //=============================================================================

00074     double  _matrix4[4][4];
00076     bool _translationOnly;

00078

00092     // Construct a transform to rotate around an arbitrary axis with specified angle
00093     Transform(const double r, const AnglePreference preference, const SimTK::Vec3& axis);
